name: MethodologyID
rule: !is.na(MethodologyID) & grepl("\\.pdf$", MethodologyID, ignore.case = TRUE) & grepl("^ftp|^http|^https|^www", MethodologyID, ignore.case = TRUE)

name: PhotoID
description: URL address for photo of particle
rule: !is.na(PhotoID) & grepl("(\\.jpg$)|(\\.png$)", PhotoID, ignore.case = TRUE) & grepl("^ftp|^http|^https|^www", PhotoID, ignore.case = TRUE)

name: SpectraID
description: URL address for spectra of particle
rule: !is.na(SpectraID) & grepl("(\\.csv$)|(\\.asp$)|(\\.spa$)|(\\.spc$)|(\\.jdx$)|(\\.rds$)|(\\.qs$)|(\\.json$)|(\\.yaml$)|(\\.zip$)|(\\.[0-999]$)", SpectraID, ignore.case = TRUE) & grepl("^ftp|^http|^https|^www", SpectraID, ignore.case = TRUE)

name: FinalAnalysisDate
description: The date the analysis for the particle was finalized.

name: Comments
description: Any comments about the particle analysis
